ai-vb2:70.7_0: They may be seen the defilements of the defilements. They may be connected with the defilements. They may be connected with the defilements. They may not be connected with the defilements.
ai-vb2:71.1_0: (They are) not given up through vision (of the First Path).

ai-vb2:71.3_0: (They are) not given up through development (of the rest of the sense spheres).

ai-vb2:71.6_0: (These two) would be given up by seeing, and be given up by seeing (of the First Path).

ai-vb2:71.10_0: They may be with thinking, but there may be without thinking.
